prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with vibrant purple fur and large red eyes.
I want a small insectoid creature that has fluffy purple tufts and big expressive eyes.
Generate a unique Pokemon that resembles a furry bug with long antennas and a playful demeanor.
Make a whimsical Pokemon with a round body, bright colors, and a curious personality.
Imagine a quirky, small Pokemon that thrives in forest environments with a soft, fluffy appearance.
Design an adorable bug Pokemon with distinctive features like antennas and a round shape.
Show me a Pokemon that is both cute and quirky, with a color palette of purple and red.
